dmca.title: Segami and Digirad Software License Agreement
dmca.body:
This firm represents Segami Corporation. It has come to our attention that a Software License Agreement between Segami Corporation and Digirad Corporation dated June 1999 ("License Agreement") has been posted under sample business contracts on your website at http://contracts.onecle.com/digirad/segami.lic.1999.06.16.shtml.

Demand is hereby made that you immediately remove the License Agreement and any
other agreements to which Segami is a party. All agreements entered by Segami are subject to strict confidentiality terms and Onecle Inc's posting of Segami's agreements on its website are in direct violation of these terms.

Thank you for your prompt attention and assistance in this matter. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
